body:
Comment 1: 
$ cat x.go
package main

func f(x T, x,
y T, x, y,
z T,
x, y, z T) {
}
$ gofmt x.go
package main

func f(x T, x,
y T, x, y,
z T, x, y, z T) {
}
$ 

Gofmt preserves the line break in the middle of "x,\ny T" but
not the one between "z T," and "x, y, z T".
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
